description:
Brian has a hot little muscle body with a nice hairy chest.
"Have you always had muscles?"
"Yeah, I guess," he said. "They came in pretty early."
He said he spends two hours a day in the gym with his training partner.
"I'm a bit stronger that he is," Brian said. "He has a great attitude though."
The best thing about Brian... he's a shooter! Check out how far the cum goes. We're talking at least seven feet!
title: Brian
